img_summary: The image depicts a vibrant plant with pink flowers and green leaves, likely serving as an ingredient in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the surrounding context, it is part of a collection of items such as Millenium Ginseng, Licorice, Snake-Head Mushroom, and Monkey-Head Fungus, which are categorized by rarity and location. These ingredients appear to play a role in crafting, trading, or progression within the game.
